content: SeedlyTV EP02 Credit Card Miles Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Apr 2019How can a uni student earn miles without supplementary credit cards from our parents?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

TWTay WenHaoLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 14 Apr 2019You can consider secured credit cards if you dont meet the minimum salary requirements. Usually requires $10,000 as fixed deposit for the collateral. After 1 year or when you are able to hit the salary requirements you can take back the deposit.0 comments0
